ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Providing delicious, high-quality meals to Georgia's biggest companies and hotels.
ABOUT.WHY_CARD1_DESCRIPTION: We believe great food brings people together.
ABOUT.WHY_CARD2_DESCRIPTION: We provide top-notch food service to large organizations.
ABOUT.WHY_CARD3_DESCRIPTION: Establishing strong client relationships with our reliability.
ABOUT.TIMELINE_ITEM1_DESCRIPTION: We started our journey with a small kitchen and big dreams.
ABOUT.TIMELINE_ITEM2_DESCRIPTION: Expanded to serve more clients, including major hotels and casinos.
ABOUT.TIMELINE_ITEM3_DESCRIPTION: Serving as a trusted food delivery partner across Georgia.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRO: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. Below is an outline of how we handle your information when you contact us.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PERSONAL_INFO: Personal Information: When you contact us, we collect personal information such as your name and email address.
PRIVACY_POLICY.USAGE_DATA: Usage Data: We may collect information on how you interact with our website, such as the pages you visit and actions you perform.
PRIVACY_POLICY.COOKIES: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We may use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies help us analyze website traffic and personalize your experience.
PRIVACY_POLICY.EMAIL_CONFIDENTIALITY_DESC: We respect the confidentiality of your email and personal information. When you provide your email to contact us, we will never share it with third parties. Your email will only be used to respond to your inquiry and provide relevant information.
PRIVACY_POLICY.USE_1: We use your personal information to respond to your inquiries and provide assistance when requested.
PRIVACY_POLICY.USE_2: We may use your email address to send you important updates or information related to our services.
PRIVACY_POLICY.USE_3: We do not use your personal information for marketing purposes unless you have explicitly agreed to receive such communications.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_1: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal data that we hold.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_2: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_3: You have the right to withdraw your consent to the use of your personal information at any time.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CHANGES_DESC: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the date of the last revision will be updated at the bottom of the page.

TERMS_OF_SERVICE.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.INTRO: Welcome to Lunch Line. Please read our terms of service carefully before using our website.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SERVICE_AVAILABILITY_DESC: Our website provides information about the Lunch Line services and does not offer transactional services directly through this site. You can always contact us for more details.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.USER_RESPONSIBILITIES_DESC: By using this website, you agree not to misuse or disrupt the services provided. You agree to respect the privacy and intellectual property of Lunch Line and other users.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.LIMITATION_OF_LIABILITY_DESC: Lunch Line is not responsible for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of this site or reliance on its content.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.CHANGES_TO_TERMS_DESC: Lunch Line reserves the right to update or change these Terms of Service at any time. All changes will be posted here and will take effect immediately after publication.
